name: Speed
description: These creeps have 25% increased movement speed

name: Greater Speed
description: These creeps have 60% increased movement speed

name: Xtreme Speed
description: These creeps always move at maximum speed

name: Slow
description: These creeps have only 66% of their normal movespeed

name: Invisible
description: Your builder and some towers are able to see invisible units

name: Strong
description: These creeps have 20% more HP, but grant 50% more exp and 25% more bounty

name: Rich
description: These creeps grant 60% more bounty but no experience

name: Relic Raider
description: These creeps grant only 50% bounty but have an 80% increased item drop chance and +30% item quality

name: Ultra Wisdom
description: These creeps give no bounty and do not drop items but grant 300% experience

name: Armored
description: These creeps have increased armor

name: Heavy Armored
description: These creeps have greatly increased armor

name: Xtreme Armor
description: These creeps have extremely high armor but 25% decreased movement speed

name: Evasion
description: These creeps evade 25% of all attacks

name: Xtreme Evasion
description: These creeps evade 66% of all attack

name: Ghost
description: These creeps have a 90% chance to ignore the damage of a non-spell non-magic attack

name: Spell Resistance
description: These creeps receive -50% damage from spells

name: Greater Spell Resistance
description: These creeps receive -80% damage from spells

name: Magic Immunity
description: As long as these creeps have at least 10 mana, they are immune to all spell damage, magic attacks and targetable active abilities

name: Ethereal
description: These creeps periodically become ethereal, gaining immunity against physical attacks, but taking 40% more damage from magic attacks and spells

name: Slow Aura
description: These creeps slow the attackspeed of towers in 800 range by 50%

name: Mana Drain Aura
description: These creeps decrease the mana regeneration of towers in 1200 range by 200%

name: Spellbinder
description: These creeps zap up to 3 mana-using towers in 1100 range every 5 seconds, stealing up to 30% of each tower's mana and silencing it for 5 seconds. Costs the creep 50 mana per zap.

name: Stun Revenge
description: Whenever attacked, these creeps have a 30% chance to stun the attacker for 3 seconds

name: Regeneration
description: These creeps regenerate hitpoints over time

name: Xtreme Regeneration
description: These creeps regenerate a large amount of hitpoints over time

name: Second Chance
description: Whenever these creeps receive mortal damage, they have a 50% chance to heal themselves if they have 1/3 of their mana left

name: Semi-Mechanical
description: These creeps have -50% debuff duration

name: Mechanical
description: These creeps have -90% debuff duration

name: Meaty
description: Champions and bosses with this ability drop additional food upon death.

name: Evolving
description: Any instance of damage above 5% of the creep's max hp will grant it 40% resistance against the attacking element, with halved effect on successive procs.

name: Unlucky
description: When attacked, these creeps have a 30% chance to reduce their attacker's triggerchances by 10% for 8 seconds. Stacks.

name: Flock
description: Birds are migrating from the winter countries! Double the usual amount will spawn.

name: Gravid
description: The children of these creeps jump out when their parents die. They mature quickly...

name: Protector
description: When a nearby creep dies, champions will channel a curse on the killing tower, reducing its attack and spell damage by 130% and its multicrit count by 2.

name: Manashield
description: These creeps reduce damage they take by up to 80% by using mana. Less mana, less damage reduction. These creeps will explode when out of mana, leaving no corpse.

name: Manashield+
description: These creeps reduce damage they take by up to 80% based on how much mana they have left. These creeps will explode when out of mana, leaving no corpse.

name: Necromancer
description: When a lesser creep dies, a nearby champion with this ability will use mana to raise the dead lesser creep as a skeleton after a delay of 3 seconds.

name: Purge Revenge
description: These creeps have a 15% chance to purge their attacker of 2 purgeable buffs and slow its attack speed by 150% for 4 seconds.

name: Fireball
description: These creeps have a 5% chance to destroy the attacking tower if it is below level 15.

name: Dart
description: These creeps have only 40% of their normal movespeed, but have a 5% chance to dart forward when damaged. 6 second cooldown.

name: Broody
description: These creeps lay an egg every 6 seconds at the cost of 30 mana.
